articles.author: FOX 13 News
articles.title: West Valley no-appointment vaccine clinic runs out of doses - fox13now.com
articles.description: Those who are eligible for the COVID-19 vaccine but do not have an appointment were able to get one Sunday in West Valley City.
articles.content:
UPDATE: West Valley City updated their original Facebook post to state that all available vaccines had been distributed by 1:22 PM Sunday.
